meta_title: What Does Calibration Mean? The 2026 Industrial Standards
meta_description: 70% of unplanned downtime traces to measurement drift. Master calibration standards, ISO 17025 compliance, and how Factory AI automates accuracy in 2026.
title: What Does Calibration Mean? The Definitive Guide to Industrial Metrology and Accuracy in 2026

hero_image.alt: Hero image for What Does Calibration Mean? The Definitive Guide to Industrial Metrology and Accuracy in 2026

image_prompt: A high-resolution, photo-realistic hero image of a diverse group of three maintenance professionals—two men and one woman—working in a modern, clean industrial manufacturing environment. They are wearing full professional PPE, including white hard hats, clear safety glasses, and high-visibility neon vests over work uniforms. One technician is standing near a large, complex stainless steel pump assembly, while another is holding a professional handheld calibration device (showing only the back of the device). The third technician is looking at a tablet (back of the tablet visible). The lighting is bright and professional, highlighting the clean, organized nature of a top-tier facility. No text or logos are visible on the equipment or clothing. Full-body shots showing the scale of the industrial machinery.
